item.description:
@Dr_Blunt_420 wrote:

[quote=“SomethingToHide, post:33, topic:2417”]The only things about computers my friends know about me is that I CCF sometimes.

My girlfriend knows pretty much everything I do on here. She used to play runescape when she was in like 6th grade I think. She gives me ideas for renders and such sometimes. We “bang”.

It’s not that they don’t mix, it’s that you don’t go up and say it the first second you’re talking. Either way, nobody should “not bang” someone just because they do more things on the computer. Unless they do things on the computer while banging.[/quote]

LMAO! I’ve yet to get a lapdance from my girlfriend (whom lives with me) while I was on the computer. But we never go clubing either… So no grinding between us anyways Lots of staying at home, late nite drinking ohh well, its all good!

The only things about computers my friends know about me is that I CCF sometimes.

My girlfriend knows pretty much everything I do on here. She used to play runescape when she was in like 6th grade I think. She gives me ideas for renders and such sometimes. We “bang”.
